title: Arrow
content: Function: Shoot it at enemies with a bow to deal damage.
How to Use: Click where you want to shoot.
Strength: 3/20
Recipe: 1 bone and 1 stick

title: Diamond Mace
content: Function: Harms and cuts down trees
How to Use: Press space to swing the mace around you.
Strength: 17/20
Recipe: 3 iron and 2 sticks

title: Iron Axe
content: Function: Harms and cuts down trees
How to Use: Press space to swing axe
Strength: 11/20
Recipe: 3 iron and 2 sticks

title: Iron Pickaxe
content: Function: Use it to break rocks.
How to Use: Press space to swing pickaxe at a rock.
Recipe: 3 iron and 2 sticks

title: Jade Knife
content: Function: Harms and cuts down trees
How to Use: Press space to stab with knife
Strength: 2/20
Recipe: 500 Jade

title: Knife
content: Function: Harms and cuts down trees
How to Use: Press space to stab with knife
Strength: 1/20
Recipe: 2 iron and 1 stick

title: Sharp Iron Axe
content: Function: Harms and cuts down trees
How to Use: Press space to swing axe
Strength: 14/20
Recipe: Iron Axe and one bone

title: Sharp Stone Axe
content: Function: Harms and cuts down trees
How to Use: Press space to swing axe
Strength: 11/20
Recipe: Stone Axe and one bone

title: Sharp Wood Axe
content: Function: Harms and cuts down trees
How to Use: Press space to swing axe
Strength: 6/20
Recipe: Wood Axe and one bone

title: Spear
content: Function: Shoot it at enemies to deal damage.
How to Use: Click where you want to throw and it will boomerang there and back.
Strength: 3/20
Recipe: 1 iron and 2 sticks

title: Stone Axe
content: Function: Harms and cuts down trees
How to Use: Press space to swing axe
Strength: 6/20
Recipe: 3 stones and 2 sticks

title: Stone Pickaxe
content: Function: Use it to break rocks.
How to Use: Press space to swing pickaxe at a rock.
Recipe: 3 stones and 2 sticks

title: Wood Axe
content: Function: Harms and cuts down trees
How to Use: Press space to swing axe
Strength: 3/20
Recipe: 3 wood and 2 sticks

title: Wood Pickaxe
content: Function: Use it to break rocks.
How to Use: Press space to swing pickaxe at a rock.
Recipe: 3 wood and 2 sticks

title: Shovel
content: Function: Use it to harvest plants.
How to Use: Press space to shovel
Recipe: 1 iron and 2 sticks

title: Bow
content: Function: Use it to shoot arrows.
How to Use: click where you want to shoot
Recipe: 3 sticks and 3 strings

title: Stick
content: Recipe: Logs, or saplings
How to find: Chop down trees with an axe.

title: Log
content: Recipe: 6 sticks
How to find: Chop down trees with an axe.

title: Iron Ore
content: How to find: Mine rocks with a pickaxe
Use: Smelt in furnace to get iron

title: Stone
content: How to find: Mine rocks with a pickaxe

title: Raw Bacon
content: How to find: Kill pig
Use: Cook on fire to get bacon.

title: Bacon
content: How to get: cook raw bacon
Use: Just eat it.

title: Steak
content: How to find: Kill a cow
Use: Cook on fire to get a cooked steak.

title: Cooked Steak
content: How to get: Cook steak
Use: Just eat it.

title: Hydromelon
content: How to get: harvest with shovel
How to find: they are in areas with extreme heat.
Use: Eat it to get heat resistance.

title: Crab
content: How to get: kill crab

title: Cooked Crab
content: How to get: Cook crab
Use: Just eat it.

title: Bread
content: How to get: combine 3 wheat
Use: Just eat it.

title: Wheat
content: How to get: Harvest wheat plant in the village

title: Seed
content: How to get: Harvest wheat plant in the village

title: Strawberries
content: How to get: Harvest the strawberry plant
Use: Just eat it.

title: Chillshroom
content: How to get: harvest with shovel
How to find: they are in areas with extreme cold
Use: Eat it to get heat resistance.

title: Coal
content: How to find: Mine rocks with a pickaxe
Use: fuel for furnace, makes torches and campfire

title: Bone
content: How to find: Kill goblins
Use: weapon upgrades

title: Iron
content: How to get: smelt iron ore in furnace
Use: makes weapons and tools

title: String
content: How to find: Kill spiders
Use: make bow

title: Torch
content: Recipe: 2 sticks and 1 coal
Use: lights up dark areas

title: Furnace
content: Recipe: 8 stone
How to use: click on it to open the furnace menu, and the controls are on the menu.
How to place: walk to where you want it and press space, it will wait until you leave its area before placing.
Use: smelts items and lights up dark areas

title: Portal
content: Recipe: 8 iron
Use: place it and enter it to teleport to a boss dimension.

title: Shield
content: Recipe: 1 iron and 6 logs
Use: protect yourself from damage
Protection: 5/16

title: Iron Chestplate
content: Recipe: 8 iron
Use: protect yourself from damage
Protection: 7/16

title: Chainmail Vest
content: Recipe: 4 chains
Use: protect yourself from damage
Protection: 5.5/16

title: Leather Coat
content: Recipe: 8 leather
Use: protect yourself from damage
Protection: 2/16

title: Warm Chainmail Vest
content: Recipe: 4 chains and 4 leather
Use: protect yourself from damage
Protection: 5.7/16

title: Miners Helment
content: Recipe: 3 iron, 2 leather, and 1 coal
Use: protect yourself from damage
Protection: 3/16

title: Leather
content: How to find: kill a cow
Use: warm armor

title: Chain
content: Recipe: 1 iron
Use: crafting

title: Chest
content: Recipe: 8 logs
How to use: click on it to open and press it again to take/put items in it. walk away to close it.
How to place: walk to where you want it and press space, it will wait until you leave its area before placing.
Use: storage

title: Campfire
content: Recipe: 1 coal and 3 logs
How to use: click on it with steak, raw bacon, or a crab to cook it. Click on it while holding nothing to skip to the next morning and set spawn.
How to place: walk to where you want it and press space, it will wait until you leave its area before placing.
Use: smelts items, lets you sleep, and lights up dark areas

title: Sapling
content: Variants: Pine(pine sapling) and oak(sapling)
How to use: press space with it to plant that kind of tree.
Use: replant tree, and craft into sticks

title: Sandworm Tooth
content: How to Find: Venture onto an isle of heat and sand, and kill the worm lurching there
Use: make a powerful weapon

title: Diamond
content: How to find: venture onto an isle of heat and sand, and break the rocks with a rare chance of finding it
Use: make a powerful weapon

title: Jade
content: How to find: trade with the villagers in the village
Use: curency
Note: it only shows up in the village

title: Crab
content: Where they live: in sandy and wet places
Drops: Crab

title: Pig
content: Where they live: in a warm climate
Drops: raw bacon

title: Cow
content: Where they live: in a wam climate
Drops: steak and leather

title: Dwarves
content: Where they live: in villages
Use: trading
Note: these ones are villagers
Note: can only trade with them while their sleeping or talking(wont see) in the village square

title: Rock
content: How to find: usally in caves
Use: to find resources; stone, coal, iron, there are more very rare ones
How to break: use pickaxes

title: Tree
content: How to find: never in caves
Use: to find resources; stick, log, sapling
How to break: use axes

title: Save
content: Use: to save your game
How to save: go into inventory and press save button. Then press space to pick your save; put in the # on the left for any of the times. Then double click the code, copy it, and press space to leave
Note: the code is encoded into numbers so you cant edit it

title: Load
content: Use: to load a game save
How to load: go into inventory and press load button, then paste your save there, and wait for it to start loading.
Note: if the code is incorrect; not a valid, not game given code, it will lag game out.

title: Craft
content: Use: to make new tools and materials
How to craft: Go into inventory and scroll through the crafting list. Once you find the item you want to craft hit the anvil button and type in the number of what you want to craft
If not there: if theres a list called Unlocked Recipies hit the hammer button and it will swap.

title: Respawn
content: How to set: sleep by campfire, distroy campfire to set spawn to default
Default: at the place where you spawn into the game
Use: if you die you spawn closer to a spot you want

title: Inventory
content: Use: store items

How to move items: if in the main area press 1, 2, or 3 to move the item your mouse is over to that slot, press 5 to equip that item(certian ones). if not in the main inventory area press 4 to move to main area
Use of hotbar: when out of inventory click or press 1, 2, or 3 to change current item. the current item is the item you are currently using.
Navigation: scroll to see all of main inventory area
Note: there is no limit on items in any way.

title: Spider
content: How to find: in caves
How to kill: hit with wepaon
Drops: string

title: Goblin
content: How to find: in caves or on land at night
How to kill: hit with wepaon
Drops: bone

title: Basaltor
content: How to find: make a portal and enter it
How to kill: hit with wepaon or shoot with a bow
Drops: nothing

title: Sandworm
content: How to find: desert, and it will find you first
How to kill: hit with wepaon
Drops: 3 sandworm teeth

title: Walk
content: Use: to move
How to walk: WASD or arrow keys

title: Eat
content: Use: not starve
How to eat: hold food and press space to eat.
Note: scroll through food catagorie to see if its a food, some look like they could be but arn't.

title: View
content: Note: it shows one peace of the map at a time
Note: the zoom could change
Note: change map by trying to go into a side

title: Light
content: Time: there is a day and night cycle it lasts 17 minutes for a full cycle
Light Sources: torches, lit furnaces, and campfires
Warning: goblins like to spawn in dark areas
Note: You can carry a torch in your hand and it will light up a small area around you

title: leperchaun
content: Use: has a quest for you
Quest: find his gold and recive a reward

title: Music
content: Day time & inventory: Menu Music on Pixabay
Night time & cave maps: Glitch in the Dark on Pixabay
Village: Raining Village - Video Game Theme on Pixabay
Boss maps: Fast Paced Boss Battle on Pixabay
